sendBroadcast(Broadcast) - Method in class bgu.spl.mics.impl.MessageBusImpl
 
sendBroadcast(Broadcast) - Method in class bgu.spl.mics.impl.MessageBusImpl
 
sendBroadcast(Broadcast) - Method in interface bgu.spl.mics.MessageBus
add the Broadcast b to the message queues of all the micro-services subscribed to b.getClass().
sendBroadcast(Broadcast) - Method in class bgu.spl.mics.MicroService
send the broadcast message b using the message-bus.
sendRequest(Request<?>, MicroService) - Method in class bgu.spl.mics.impl.MessageBusImpl
 
sendRequest(Request<?>, MicroService) - Method in class bgu.spl.mics.impl.MessageBusImpl
 
sendRequest(Request<?>, MicroService) - Method in interface bgu.spl.mics.MessageBus
add the Request r to the message queue of one of the micro-services subscribed to r.getClass() in a round-robin fashion.
sendRequest(Request<T>, Callback<T>) - Method in class bgu.spl.mics.MicroService
send the request r using the message-bus and storing the onComplete callback so that it will be executed in this micro-service event loop once the request is complete.
